      • situateScenario

        public void situateScenario(Scenario scenario,
                   sim.util.Double2D position,
                   sim.util.Double2D alpha,
                   sim.util.Double2D beta,
                   sim.util.Double2D gamma)
                     throws ShanksException
        Situate the scenario in the complex scenario main display
        Parameters:
        scenario -
        position - offset of the scenario
        alpha - is the angle in the plane XY
        beta - is the angle in the plane XZ (only X rotation will be shown in the 2D portrayal
        gamma - is the angle in the plane YZ (only Y rotation will be shown in the 2D portrayal
        Throws:
        DuplicatedPortrayalIDException
        ScenarioNotFoundException
        ShanksException
